channel.title: CVE Feed for Mozilla -- Firefox for iOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mozilla -- Firefox for iOS

item.title: CVE-2024-26283|2024-08-29T13:55:40.992Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20ios
item.description: An attacker could have executed unauthorized scripts on top origin sites using a JavaScript URI when opening an external URL with a custom Firefox scheme. This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 123.

item.title: CVE-2024-43111|2024-08-07T14:35:04.587Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20ios
item.description: Long pressing on a download link could potentially allow Javascript commands to be executed within the browser This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 129.

item.title: CVE-2024-31392|2024-08-02T01:52:56.841Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20ios
item.description: If an insecure element was added to a page after a delay, Firefox would not replace the secure icon with a mixed content security status This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 124.

item.title: CVE-2024-31393|2024-08-02T01:52:56.878Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20ios
item.description: Dragging Javascript URLs to the address bar could cause them to be loaded, bypassing restrictions and security protections This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 124.

item.title: CVE-2024-38313|2024-06-14T16:24:07.846Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20ios
item.description: In certain scenarios a malicious website could attempt to display a fake location URL bar which could mislead users as to the actual website address This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 127.

item.title: CVE-2024-31393|2024-06-04T17:37:00.516Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20ios
item.description: Dragging Javascript URLs to the address bar could cause them to be loaded, bypassing restrictions and security protections This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 124.

item.title: CVE-2024-31392|2024-06-04T17:36:41.520Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20ios
item.description: If an insecure element was added to a page after a delay, Firefox would not replace the secure icon with a mixed content security status This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 124.

item.title: CVE-2024-38313|2024-06-13T20:01:13.281Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20ios
item.description: In certain scenarios a malicious website could attempt to display a fake location URL bar which could mislead users as to the actual website address This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 127.

item.title: CVE-2024-38312|2024-06-13T20:01:13.543Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20ios
item.description: When browsing private tabs, some data related to location history or webpage thumbnails could be persisted incorrectly within the sandboxed app bundle after app termination This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 127.

item.title: CVE-2024-38312|2024-08-02T04:04:25.248Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20ios
item.description: When browsing private tabs, some data related to location history or webpage thumbnails could be persisted incorrectly within the sandboxed app bundle after app termination This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 127.

item.title: CVE-2024-38313|2024-08-02T04:04:25.077Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20ios
item.description: In certain scenarios a malicious website could attempt to display a fake location URL bar which could mislead users as to the actual website address This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 127.

item.title: CVE-2024-43111|2024-08-06T15:55:14.910Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20ios
item.description: Long pressing on a download link could potentially allow Javascript commands to be executed within the browser This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 129.

item.title: CVE-2024-43112|2024-08-06T15:55:13.378Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20ios
item.description: Long pressing on a download link could potentially provide a means for cross-site scripting This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 129.

item.title: CVE-2024-43113|2024-08-06T15:55:13.829Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20ios
item.description: The contextual menu for links could provide an opportunity for cross-site scripting attacks This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 129.

item.title: CVE-2024-43113|2024-08-07T13:32:03.863Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20for%20ios
item.description: The contextual menu for links could provide an opportunity for cross-site scripting attacks This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 129.
